content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I would like to offer you a rental price of 500 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to negotiate the rental price. Can I see the price list for the apartment?
name: James Smith

content: Sure, I have a price list available. Please review it and let me know if you have any questions or if you would like to make an offer.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to make an offer of 450 Euros per month.
name: James Smith

content: Thank you for your offer. I am sorry, but I cannot accept that price. The rental price for this apartment is 500 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine
